verses.verse: <S%H8104>Observe<s%> the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib,<s%> and <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> bread with it; <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread <S%H5921>therewith,<s%> even the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> for you <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in <S%H2649>haste:<s%> that you may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>

And there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7603>leavened<s%> bread <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there any thing of the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

You <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> within <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you:

But <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in, <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> at the <S%H935>going<s%> <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> at the <S%H4150>season<s%> that you <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And you shall <S%H1310>roast<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> and you shall <S%H6437>turn<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to your <S%H168>tents.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread: and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assembly<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> shall you <S%H5608>number<s%> to you: <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> from such time as you <S%H2490>begin<s%> to put the <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to the <S%H7054>corn.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H4530>tribute<s%> of a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offering of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> according as the LORD your God has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you:

And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> that are <S%H7130>among<s%> you, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> after that you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in your <S%H1637>corn<s%> and your <S%H3342>wine:<s%>

And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H2282>feast,<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> that are within your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H2287>keep<s%> a <S%H2287>solemn<s%> <S%H2287>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8393>increase,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> therefore you shall <S%H389>surely<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2138>males<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose;<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread, and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles:<s%> and they shall not <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7387>empty:<s%>

Every <S%H376>man<s%> shall give as he is <S%H4979>able,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

<S%H8199>Judges<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall you <S%H5414>make<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, throughout your <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5186>wrest<s%> <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> you shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>gift:<s%> for a <S%H7810>gift<s%> does <S%H5786>blind<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H5557>pervert<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

That which is altogether <S%H6664>just<s%> shall you <S%H7291>follow,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

You shall not <S%H5193>plant<s%> you a <S%H842>grove<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> you.
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H6965>set<s%> you up any <S%H4676>image;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8130>hates.<s%>
